weka.dl4j.interpretability

Class WekaScoreCAM

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.interpretability.AbstractCNNSaliencyMapWrapper
      • weka.dl4j.interpretability.WekaScoreCAM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler

    public class WekaScoreCAM
extends AbstractCNNSaliencyMapWrapper
    WEKA Wrapper for the Deeplearning4j ScoreCAM implementation. Valid options are: 

     -bs <int>
  The mini batch size to use for map generation
     -target-classes <int,int,...>
  Output class to generate saliency maps for; default is -1 (use the highest probability class). This only needs to be set if wanting to use a non-default class from the *command line*; if using the *GUI*, the 'View Saliency Map' window contains the interface for setting this.
     -output <file location>
  File for the saliency map to be saved in
     -normalize
  When generating the heatmap, should the values be normalized to be in [0, 1]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • processImage

        public void processImage(java.io.File imageFile)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCNNSaliencyMapWrapper
        Main processing entrypoint. Takes an image as input, and performs the necessary processing on it. Note that this is performed separately to the actual saliency map generation. This method should only perform the expensive one-time processing on an image.
        Specified by:
        processImage in class AbstractCNNSaliencyMapWrapper
        Parameters:
        imageFile - Image to process heatmap for.
